titles.title: If From The Right Course I Depart (easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If from the right course I depart Then ease my lot would be But I remember how my Lord Did suffer agony{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'll utterly forsake this world And sever all its ties My path may narrow more and more And all against me rise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though men my scowl and laugh to scorn I only want His smile His "well done" only I'd secure While here this little while{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not after greatness do I seek Nor glory here desire But humbly I would serve the Lord His praise that day acquire{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm daily gazing at the light Shed from His judgment seat That all my living and my work The test of fire may meet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let others seek for great success For glory wealth and name Let them procure their grandeur here Their followers and fame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In solitude and poverty Though prospering not in soul Yet faithfully I'll follow Him Until I reach the goal{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know that when on earth He dwelt His lot was but the cross And that is why I only wish With Him to suffer loss{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Since all my glories lie ahead I must to patience cleave I will not go before my Lord And glory here recieve 10. That day my honors I will have The Lord will dry my tears So faithfully I'll still press on Until my Lord appears{/lang-eng}
